p: The amplicons obtained by conventional PCR for DENV and CHIKV were purified and sequenced by Macrogen Inc. (Seoul, Korea) in an ABI 3730xl automated sequencer. To identify the DENV genotypes and CHIKV lineages circulating in the area during the study period, the sequences obtained were compared with various prototype strains of each of these viruses using BLAST and the on-line tool, Dengue, Zika & Chikungunya Viruses Typing Tool Version 0.9 â€“ Alpha (available at www.bioafrica.net/software.php).
